name: OR_LOG_ANESTLOC
description: The OR_LOG_ANESTLOC table contains OR management system log anesthesia locations.

columns.name: LOG_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the log record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The number of the line of the anesthesia location information for the log.

columns.name: ANESTH_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The category value of the type of anesthesia used in the log.

columns.name: ANESTH_LOC_C_NAME
columns.description: The category value of the anesthesia location in the log.
